actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Disaster Assistance Act of 1989 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to consider damaged crops and spring replacement crops as separate crops.

summary.text: Amends the Disaster Assistance Act of 1989 to consider damaged crops and spring replacement crops as separate crops for disaster assistance purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Disaster Assistance Act of 1989 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to consider damaged crops and spring replacement crops as separate crops.
